name: Outscape Technologies
slogan: Constructive outdoor games played in cities
description: Our products are tablet & smartphone games that lead players to an adventure trail through a neighborhood or a museum of their city

jobs.title: Sales / Marketer
jobs.description:
Outscape Technologies Ltd is a start-up venture based in London, UK, that focuses on the development & commercial exploitation of puzzle-driven, Augmented Reality adventure games played in outdoor, urban environments.

We are looking to boost our sales in London and expand to other cities.

We are searching for a talented young individual with entrepreneurial mindset to assist in marketing/sales and work very closely with the founders of the company, on a part or full time internship position.
